resources.string: \ Minesweeper is a single-player video game. The object of the game is to clear an abstract minefield without detonating a mine.

\ The board is a grid of cells, and some of them are hiding a mine. Your goal is to find all of those mines, without detonating any of them.


 To accomplish that, you can press any cell -dig mode- or mark -exploration mode- it with a flag,if you are sure it contains a mine. When you press a cell, several cells can be discovered, and they will show you how many mines are around them.


 If you want to play in explore mode - markings cells with flags - just press menu button and you will be able to turn on that mode (do the same to turn it of again).


 Options: make use of the settings while in the main menu in order to turn on coordinates service as well as music.
Are you sure you want to quit this game? You will lose all progress.
